name: BSO
comment:
>>37695971

“Good.” You accept Nel's contact request; you realize you'd forgotten to earlier. His UI pings, and he gives you a stupid grin. “Mind if I hit the market square before we rendezvous with your new friends?”

“No problem, man.” He laughs. “I'll shoot you a message when it's time. We'll meet at the gate by the warehouse district, alright?”

“Sounds good. I've gotta get these weapons identified, first of all...” You say.

“There's an NPC that'll do it for you for a few creds, but most Artificers have the skill. If you catch one in town they might hit you up for free.” He responds. “If you just found that sword, it's probably a basic one, though, so I wouldn't be in a rush. Let me know if you need any help, though! I've got an errand to run too.”

He bounds off again. Eh, he's starting to grow on you. Now, to the Market Square—

Your UI pings.

> [[ Contact Request: Ayla ]]

Ayla? You remember the advertisement; she's the leader of the Writ Keepers. But you don't know an—

> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Damn, I've been trying to remember how to spell your name this whole time. ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Are you busy? ))

> [[ Incoming Call: Ayla ]]

> Accept Call
> Decline Call
